name: 黃如瑩
objective:
Objectives: 
We will explore an array of intriguing social/cultural issues while enjoying a selection of stories, in printed and multi-media forms, suitable for teenagers/young adults. These stories serve as best materials (1) not only for language learning and cultural literacy (2) but also for the cultivation of full language skills. For each story, we will engage in group discussions about the issues addressed in the text to cultivate our critical thinking.
